registrationConfirmed.title: Registration Confirmed
registrationConfirmed.subtitle: You're close to getting started
registrationConfirmed.bodyText1: You should receive an email if you haven't registered already with this email address.
registrationConfirmed.bodyText2: Confirm your account by clicking the link in the email.

form.weakPassword: You picked one of the 200 weakest passwords. It is strongly advised to chooses another password!

toast.serverError: Your request did not go through. There was a server error.
